Lyric:
[by:什么什么情况]
[00:04.00]I don't know, I guess being socially awkward has its advantages.
[00:08.10]I don't think you're socially awkward at all.
[00:11.10]I think you're just scared.
[00:45.60]Pardon me, but you really hurt my feelings.
[00:53.50]and I'm sorry.
[00:55.50]And I can never make it right,
[00:58.20]I can never say all this to you, but...
[01:55.20]I love you.
[02:02.70]And I will never hurt you.
[02:04.70]Clay.
[02:06.20]I'm not going.
[02:09.20]Not now.
[02:13.30]Not ever.
